title: Ep - 175 - CAPTAIN SANDY FROM BELOW DECK MED
description:
Captain Sandy Yawn is a world renowned captain in the yachting industry with over 28 years of experience. She is currently the captain on Bravo TV’s reality show Below Deck Mediterranean. She talks about working as a captain in a male dominated industry, how she was cast for the show, and behind the scenes of the show. 


Rob Cesternino from Rob Has a Podcast reviews this season of Big Brother on CBS. 


Producer, singer, and actress Stefanie Fair reviews Marrying Millions on Lifetime TV.


Reality Life with Kate Casey
